title: FS: 1912 T207 J.B. Ryan Cycle Back PSA 1.5 SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: 1912 T207 J.B. Ryan Cycle Back PSA 1.5 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Nice card and pretty tough. The mark designation is from someone writing "53" on the back-they should have wrote "54", right? :D Anyway the price is SOLD delivered paypal friends/family please. Thank you.

Joe K
